meanings: (사람) (informal) guy, (offensive) jerk, (Brit, inf) bloke, (Brit, inf) chap

vlive.korean: 저 촌스러운 놈들 저거! What a couple of losers would we be! 듣기 View video CASPER RADIO : 권정열 고영배의 십란한밤 #120 with 첸(CHEN) of 엑소(EXO)

vlive.korean: 네 손편지는 안 보내줬어요 나쁜 놈들! They didn't send hand letters. 듣기 View video 51k : [옥택연] 전역기념 라이브방송⭐ "기다려줘서 고마워요💕"
[방송국 놈들이!] 15개를 지키래요, 저 보고! [How can I!] They told me to do that! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL]<찾았다 스트레이 키즈> 4화
vlive.english: [How can I!] They told me to do that!

vlive.korean: 그리고 같은 반인 놈들이 이렇게 많은데 안 알려주디? You have so many classmates. None of them told you? 듣기 View video 스튜디오 픽또 / PICK DDO : Ep.3 우리… 오늘부터 1일? [인싸가 된 아싸짱 (IN-OUT SIDER)]

vlive.korean: [방송국 주변에 이런 놈들 많아] - 다 넣어주겠다고 - 넣어주겠다고? To make them join our program. - To join our program? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 ep01_새로운 시즌, 새로운 제작진!
vlive.english: To make them join our program. - To join our program?

examples.korean: Fasten the gates securely so that they do not blow open. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 놈들이 열어젖히지 못하게 정문을 단단히 잠가. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Fasten the gates securely so that they do not blow open. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Thieves had stripped the house bare. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도둑놈들이 그 집에 있던 것을 다 들고 가 버린 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: As usual, the cops get the baddies in the end. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 늘 그렇듯 결국 경찰들이 나쁜 놈들을 잡는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As usual, the cops get the baddies in the end. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The hero gets to shoot all the bad guys. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 남자 주인공이 나쁜 놈들을 모두 총으로 쏘아 죽이게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hero gets to shoot all the bad guys. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They’ve slapped 50p on the price of a pack of cigarettes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 놈들이 담배 한 갑 값에 50펜스를 더 때려 붙였어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
